product.short-description:
A silicone-free rich lather shampoo for frizz-prone hair that when used as part of the No Frizz System* helps hair stay smooth and frizz-free. Powered by our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), the No Frizz System:

  • weightlessly blocks humidity
  • smoothes hair texture so strands are polished and frictionless 
  • nourishes and conditions, leaving hair feeling moisturized

No Frizz Shampoo is ideal for all frizz-prone hair types. It is sulfate-free and  silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

*The No Frizz System consists of the No Frizz Shampoo, Conditioner and Nourishing Styling Cream
product.long-description: No Frizz Shampoo contains OFPMA, the same new anti-frizz technology as our stylers to do what silicones can't: eliminate frizzy hair by blocking humidity without weighing hair down. No Frizz Shampoo enhances the benefits of No Frizz stylers, leaving hair incredibly soft, smooth and frizz-free. Straight or curly, the shampoo leaves hair with a healthy shine and helps hair look and feel cleaner longer so you don't have to shampoo as often. It's sulfate-free, too, and provides extra gentle cleansing - perfect for colored hair.

product.short-description:
A lightweight conditioner for frizz-prone hair that when used as part of the No Frizz System* detangles, conditions and fights frizz. Powered by our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), the No Frizz System:

  • weightlessly blocks humidity
  • smoothes hair texture so strands are polished and frictionless 
  • nourishes and conditions, leaving hair feeling moisturized

No Frizz Conditioner is ideal for all frizz-prone hair types. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

*The No Frizz System consists of the No Frizz Shampoo, Conditioner and Nourishing Styling Cream
product.long-description: No Frizz Conditioner contains OFPMA, the same new anti-frizz technology as our stylers to do what silicones can't: eliminate frizzy hair by blocking humidity without weighing hair down. No Frizz Conditioner enhances the benefits of No Frizz Stylers, leaving hair deeply conditioned, smooth and frizz-free. Straight or curly, the conditioner leaves hair with a healthy shine and helps hair look and feel cleaner longer so you don't have to shampoo as often. Great for colored hair, too..

product.short-description:
A hydrating treatment that gives an extra boost of conditioning and frizz protection. Powered by our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), No Frizz Leave-in Conditioner:
  • weightlessly blocks humidity
  • smoothes hair texture so strands are polished and frictionless 
  • nourishes and conditions, leaving hair feeling moisturized
No Frizz Leave-in Conditioner is ideal for all frizz-prone hair types. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description: Developed for dry, damaged or chemically processed hair, No Frizz Leave-in Conditioner promotes optimum moisture levels without oils or silicones. It also detangles and smoothes hair leaving it looking healthy and shiny while protecting against surface damage and breakage from heat styling. The Leave-In features OFPMA - the first new anti-frizz technology in 30 years to effectively block humidity for beautifully soft, smooth, frizz-free hair. A must-have for highly processed or colored hair.

product.short-description:
A lightweight styling cream that adds thickness to each strand to help fine, flat hair to look, feel and behave like naturally full, thick hair. It is powered by our patented Thickening Molecule (PBAE),  which creates thickening dots between hair strands so it feels like you have thicker hair. PBAE lasts 5x longer. Full Thickening Cream: 

  • creates long-lasting touchable, thickness and fullness
  • delivers a hint of conditioning that won't weight your hair down

Full Thickening Cream is ideal for fine, flat hair. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description: Flat, lifeless hair results from each strand being so smooth and fine that it lays quite literally flat, one on top of the other. Full Thickening Cream is a lightweight formula that features PBAE, a new technology invented by our scientists that creates a micro-pattern of thickening points on each strand. Full creates beautiful, natural fullness and touchable body that lasts throughout the day. Because it's a completely flexible technology, your hair won't collapse or become stiff and crunchy. Great for colored hair, too.

product.short-description:
A gentle, yet thoroughly cleansing shampoo that helps to transform fine, flat hair to look, feel and behave like naturally full, thick hair. Powered by our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), Full Shampoo is the first step to:

  • removing residue for natural fullness and body
  • helping to repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer
  • preparing hair for maximum fullness

Full Shampoo is ideal for fine, flat hair. It is sulfate-free and silicone-free.  Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description: Full Shampoo is a sulfate-free daily shampoo formulated specifically to care for flat, lifeless hair. It thoroughly cleanses hair of dirt, oil and product residue in a way that_��s gentle. Full Shampoo features OFPMA which enables the surfactants to cleanse more efficiently_�� so you get complete cleansing without stripping. Full Shampoo is the first step in achieving thicker, fuller, healthy hair with body and bounce. Safe and effective on color treated hair.

product.short-description:
A lightweight conditioner that adds softness and shine while helping fine, flat hair to look, feel and behave like naturally full, thick hair. Powered by lightweight conditioning agents and our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), Full Conditioner is the second step to:

  • keeping fine, flat hair visibly healthy without compromising fullness
  • helping to repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer
  • detangle without leaving hair feeling heavy

Full Conditioner is ideal for fine, flat hair. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description: Full Conditioner is an oil-free, silicone-free conditioner formulated specifically to care for fine, thin or lifeless hair. Full Conditioner features OFPMA for superior detangling, offering a weightless alternative to silicones and oils. Utilizing a blend of lightweight conditioning agents and OFPMA, hair is soft, shiny and healthy but never heavy. Full Conditioner is an essential step in achieving thicker, fuller, healthy hair with body and bounce. Safe and effective on color treated hair.

product.short-description:
An ultra, lightweight mousse that provides flexible volume to help fine, flat hair to look, feel and behave like naturally full, thick hair. It is powered by our patented Thickening Molecule (PBAE), which creates thickening dots between hair strands so it feels like you have thicker hair. PBAE lasts 5x longer. Full Thickening Mousse: 

  • provides long lasting thickness and fullness 
  • light hold that doesn't collapse or become stiff

Full Thickening Mousse is ideal for fine, flat hair. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description: Full Thickening Mousse is designed for flat, lifeless hair. This ultra-lightweight formula features breakthrough PBAE, a new technology invented by our scientists that deposits a flexible, micro-pattern of thickening points on each strand. These thickening points add just the right amount of natural texture to the hair strands to make flat, limp hair look, act and feel like full, thick hair. Because it's a completely flexible technology, it lasts throughout the day without collapsing or becoming stiff and crunchy. It also contains just the right amount of flexible hold to help keep your style in place. Safe and effective on colored hair, too.

product.short-description:
A heat activated weightless spray that can be used on damp or dry hair to create long-lasting, shiny, smooth, straight styles. Powered by our Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), Straight:

  • weightlessly blocks humidity 
  • provides heat protection up to 450°F/230°C
  • is layerable and won't build up
  • helps to keep hair cleaner longer for straight styles that last

Straight is ideal for fine to medium hair types. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description: Straight contains aerosolized OFPMA, Living Proof_��s breakthrough molecule. It creates sleek, smooth, shiny straight hair without the use of silicones or harmful chemicals. The lightweight formula can be reapplied to dry hair extending your style for days. Straight won_��t build-up, repels dirt and actually helps to protect against heat styling.

product.short-description:
A gentle shampoo for dry, damaged hair that when used as part of the Restore System* helps hair behave like it was not damaged at all. The Restore System is designed to work together to help dry, damaged hair appear visibly healthier. Powered by our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), the Restore System:

  • instantly restores damaged hair cuticles so they act more like new
  • restores moisture levels to be more like that  of healthier, undamaged hair
  • helps to repel dirt and  oil so you can shampoo and style less often for a healthier hair care routine
  • protects from future damage and strengthens hair to become 20x more resistant to breakage 

Restore Shampoo is ideal for dry, damaged hair. It is sulfate-free and  silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

*The Restore System consists of the Restore Shampoo, Conditioner and Mask.
product.long-description: The first step to breaking the cycle of dryness and damage. It gently cleanses hair of dirt and oil without stripping. Restore Shampoo features OFPMA, our proprietary moisture-controlling molecule. Safe for color or chemically treated hair.

product.short-description:
A first-of-its-kind hair primer that extends your style 2x longer. Powered by our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), Prime Style Extender®:

  • helps to repel dirt and oil to keep hair cleaner, longer
  • creates an optimal base for all styles
  • saves time so you can forget the touch ups
  • perfects cuticles so weightlessly it can used alone or layered under other styling products

Prime Style Extender is ideal for all hair types. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
What it is:
A weightless hairstyling primer that protects and extends the life of your style.

What it does:
  • Extends your style 2X longer
  • Reduces the need to touch up style
  • Keeps your hair cleaner longer, reducing the need to shampoo as often
  • Detangles, perfects, and corrects cuticle texture
  • Thoroughly primes and creates optimal base for styling

How to use it:
  • On clean, damp hair, generously apply Prime, coating hair from roots to ends.
  • Comb through and style as usual.
  • Prime is so perfecting it can be used alone, yet so weightless it can be used under your favorite stylers.
""

product.short-description:
No Frizz keeps frizz at bay so hair stays soft and smooth even on the days you don't wash and style. Powered by our Healthy Hair Molecule (OPFMA), the biggest breakthrough in anti-frizz technology in over 30 years, No Frizz  blocks humidity 70% more effectively than silicones.

This kit contains:

  • No Frizz Shampoo* (2 oz): A rich lather shampoo that is the first step in fighting frizz.
  • No Frizz Conditioner (2 oz): A lightweight conditioner that detangles, conditions and fights frizz.
  • No Frizz Nourishing Styling Cream (2 oz): A styling cream that smoothes, conditions and eliminates frizz by blocking humidity without weighing hair down.
  • Bonus: No Frizz Leave-In Conditioner (0.33 oz): A hydrating treatment that gives an extra boost of conditioning and frizz protection.

*Sulfate-free
product.long-description: No Frizz is clinically proven to block humidity 70% more effectively than conventional anti-frizz products. The No Frizz kit contains travel sizes of No Frizz Shampoo, Conditioner & Nourishing Styling Cream and a bonus sample of No Frizz Leave-In Conditioner. No Frizz products feature OFPMA, our patented moisture-controlling molecule, to do what oils & silicones can't: eliminate frizzy hair by blocking humidity without weighing hair down. Just two weeks to a good hair day, every dayStudies show our products get more effective over time, with optimal results occurring after continued use of the entire system (No Frizz Shampoo, Conditioner and Styler)This kit contains travel sizes of:No Frizz Shampoo (2 oz)No Frizz Conditioner (2 oz)No Frizz Nourishing Styling Cream (2 oz)Bonus No Frizz Leave-In Conditioner (0.33 oz)

product.short-description:
A styling cream that creates amplified volume, touchable texture and flexible hold on dry hair for long-lasting revivability. Powered by our Meta-Volume Technology that features our patented Thickening Molecule (PBAE), Amp2® Texture Volumizer:

  • instantly creates volume & texture on dry hair
  • is flexible & re-stylable
  • has long-lasting revivability
  • has light hold and a natural finish

Amp2® Texture Volumizer is ideal for fine to medium hair with short or layered haircuts.  It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
What it is:
Amp2 provides instant and revivable volume and texture for 48 hours. Powered by our multi-talented Meta-Volume TechnologyTM a combination of PBAE, flexible texturizers and holding polymers that create instant amplified volume, touchable texture and flexible hold to dry hair.

What it does:
  • Creates instant volume and texture with flexible hold
  • Provides a revivable style for up to 48 hours
  • Can be used on dry hair

How to use it:
Rub a small dab evenly between hands until the product is transparent to activate. Apply to clean, dry hair starting in the underneath sections of hair. Lift and muss hair as you work the product into desired style. Avoid direct application to scalp or applying in a downward motion. To revive your style, no additional product is needed. Revive with fingertips or brush on the second day. For best results, review the \""How to Use\"" tips below.""

product.short-description:
A multi-tasking medium hold hairspray with the versatility to create looks on damp or dry hair. Powered by our Flexible Web Technology to hold hair in place at any step during the styling process, Flex Hairspray:

  • sets, styles & finishes on damp or dry hair
  • delivers flexible, touchable control
  • is brushable, layerable, reworkable
  • has medium hold
  • provides heat protection up to 450°F/230°C

Flex Hairspray is ideal for any hair type. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
What it is:
3 solutions. 1 spray.

Flex is the solution for every step of your styling process. Set, style and finish any look on damp or dry hair with layerable, reworkable, touchable hold.

Set: Create lasting volume, waves & curls with touchable, brushable hold. Flex is buildable and never flakes.

Style: Prep, build and add structure to any look. Flex is completely layerable without build up. You can never use too much.

Finish: Add flexible or firm control to your style. Flex gives natural movement, humidity protection and beautiful shine without deflating the style.


How to use it:
Use Flex on damp or dry hair. On damp hair, style using a brush & any heat tool. On dry hair, style or finish with or without heat.

product.short-description:
A super concentrated, oil-free and silicone-free serum that provides superior smoothness and cuts styling time nearly in half. Powered by our Sera-Smooth Technology that features our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), Satin:

  • provides superior smoothness in nearly half the time 
  • delivers smoothness and unrivalled frizz protection without tradeoffs
  • adds shine, movement and softness
  • improves manageability 

Satin Hair Serum is ideal for medium to thick hair types. It is silicone-free and oil-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
What it is:
Satin is the first ever oil-free and silicone-free hair serum that offers superior smoothness in half the time without tradeoffs.

What it does:
  • Superior smoothness
  • Unrivalled frizz protection
  • Lustrous shine
  • Natural movement
  • Improved manageability
  • Increased softness
No oils. No silicones.

How to use it:
  • On clean, damp hair, start with one pump and rub between hands.
  • Distribute evenly throughout hair. Apply more if needed. Avoid applying directly to roots.
  • For best results, blow dry.
  • On dry hair, use sparingly to tame flyaways and polish ends.
""

product.short-description:
A genius solution that allows you to style and treat in one step.  Powered by our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA) and our Thickening Molecule (PBAE), Perfect hair Day (PhD) 5-in-1 Styling Treatment: 

  • delivers the five benefits for beautiful healthy looking hair in one easy step - smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength and polish
  • styles and treats without compromising one for the other  

Perfect hair Day (PhD) 5-in-1 Styling Treatment is ideal for all hair types. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
What it is:
Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PHD) 5-in-1 Styling Treatment is powered by our award winning, patented molecules, OFPMA & PBAE, to provide the 5 styling & treatment benefits you need for beautiful, healthy hair in one simple step_��smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength & polish.

What it does:
  • Provides a genius balance of styling & treatment benefits
  • Provides 5 benefits needed for beautiful, healthy hair:

      - Smoothness

      - Volume

      - Conditioning

      - Strength

      - Polish

    • Heat Protection
    • UV Protection
    • Static Control
    • Oil-free & silicone-free

    How to use it:
    • Apply to damp hair.

      - For fine and/or short hair, start with a nickel size or less.

      - For medium to thick and/or long hair, start with a quarter size.

    • Comb through hair
    • For best results, blow dry.
    • Tip: For a more bodified blowout use a round brush. For a sleek blowout use a flat brush. Blow dry section by section.
      • ""

  • Keeps your hair cleaner longer, reducing the need to shampoo as often

How to use it:

product.long-description:
Start my generously applying Prime to clean, damp hair, coating hair from roots to ends. Comb through. 

Follow steps below for desired styles:

  • For a smooth & sleek style, apply one pump of Satin between hands and run together. Avoid applying directly to roots. For best results, blow dry. 
  • For bombshell body, mist Flex on damp or dry hair. Curl or blow dry. 
  • For tousled texture, after your hair is styled and dry, rub a dab of Amp² between hands until the product is transparent. Muss & tousle throughout hair. Avoid applying directly to scalp or applying in a downward motion.

  • Advanced shampoo-activated color seal technology plus UV absorbers keep color vibrant & truer, longer

  • makes hair look 3x fuller, with touchable volume
  • controls wiry, unmanageable strands
  • when used with the Timeless line, hair is less prone to breakage – even through heat styling

Timeless Plumping Mousse is ideal for women with fine or thinning hair. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
Bring back the OOMPH

With age, your hair loses its density and volume. This mousse works like a temporary filler. It brings the oomph back to your hair with our volumizing technology plus amino acids that makes it look 3x fuller with volume that touchable, long lasting, and revivable. Silicone-free and color safe.

  • Makes hair look 3x fuller, with volume that’s touchable and revivable
  • Contains significantly more of our patented volumizing technology, PBAE, than Full Mousse
  • Controls wiry, unmanageable strands
  • When used with the Timeless collection, hair is less prone to breakage – even through heat styling

product.display-name: Perfect hair Day (PhD) Fresh Cut Split End Mender
product.short-description:
A lightweight lotion that instantly seals split ends to keep hair looking and feeling freshly cut. Featuring our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA) and our instant-zip technology which:

  • keeps hair looking smooth and polished 
  • mimics the look of a fresh haircut by sealing and smoothing  ends and aligning hair fibers for a cleaner look
  • instantly seals and heals split ends 

Perfect hair Day (PhD) Fresh Cut is ideal for all hair types. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair. 

Application tip: For best results, apply it daily to wet hair after a shower and on dry hair after styling. To help prevent split ends, start using it right after you get a haircut. To treat split ends, use Fresh Cut to keep them sealed. 

""
product.long-description:
Instantly seals and heals split ends to keep hair looking and feeling freshly cut.

Fresh Cut is lightweight, fast absorbing, and perfect for all hair types. Plus it is layerable enough that you can use it on both wet and dry hair (and with your favorite styling products).

  • Instantly seals and heals split ends thanks to our advanced instant-zip technology
  • Mimics the look of a fresh haircut by sealing and smoothing  ends and aligning hair fibers for a cleaner look
  • For best results, apply it daily to wet hair after a shower and on dry hair after styling. To help prevent split ends, start using it right after you get a haircut. To treat split ends, use Fresh Cut to keep them sealed.

product.short-description:
A heat activated spray to give a boost at the roots for a natural, touchable feel that lasts all day.  Full Root Lift delivers a fine spray pattern that is never stiff or sticky for:

  • long-lasting lift and height
  • a non-tacky comb-out

Full Root Lift is ideal for fine, flat hair. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
Living Proof Full Root Lift is a heat activated spray to give a boost at the roots for a natural, touchable feel that lasts all day. Never stiff or sticky just long-lasting lift and height. Plus:

  • Fine spray pattern
  • Non-tacky comb-out

product.short-description:
A spray that creates volume and texture that’s almost as light as air and gives big, lasting results on dry hair.

It's powered by our Volumizing and Texturizing Molecule (ETAS) which is lighter and bigger than industry standard ingredients, so it delivers big volume and texture on your hair without weighing it down. Full Dry Volume Blast: 

  • delivers instant volume and texture that lasts
  • transforms fine, flat hair into voluminous styles. No crunchiness or stiffness
  • use anytime, anywhere for instant results

Application tip: Shake to activate the formula. ETAS are so lightweight that they float in the can, so it’s important to shake before each spray. Then, apply on dry hair from root to ends for all-over volume and texture.

Full Dry Volume Blast is ideal for fine, flat hair and anyone seeking volume and texture. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.
product.long-description:
Living Proof Full Dry Volume Blast creates volume and texture that’s (almost) as light as air and gives big, lasting results. It contains our new, patent-pending Expandable, Textured Aero-Spheres called ETAS. It’s lighter and bigger than industry standard ingredients, so it delivers big volume and texture on your hair without weighing it down.

  • Instant volume and texture that lasts.
  • Transforms fine, flat hair into voluminous styles. No crunchiness or stiffness here.
  • Shake to activate the formula. The ETAS are so lightweight they float in the can so it’s important to shake before each spray. Then apply on dry hair from root to ends for all-over volume and texture.

Use anytime, anywhere for instant results.

""

An innovative styler that is applied in the shower and lightly rinsed, leaving behind only what you need to create beautiful air-dried styles. Featuring our Thickening Molecule and lightweight conditioners which deliver:

  • enhanced natural texture
  • body
  • softness
  • shine 

Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler is ideal for straight to slightly wavy hair. It is silicone-free and sulfate-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

product.short-description:
This versatile styler used on damp or dry hair gives you the freedom to wear your hair in different ways to simply tame and manage, create a polished blowout, or deconstructed second-day hair. 

Tame: Tames and grooms dry hair for easy, manageability

Blowout: Smoothes for polished blowouts

Deconstruct: Creates definition and separation on dry hair for deconstructed, second-day hair

Our Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA) and versatile styling emollient blend work together to give easy spreadability while creating smoothness, control and enhanced definition on damp or dry hair. Provides heat protection.

T.B.D. Multi-Tasking Styler™  is ideal for all hair types.  It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

This buildable, layerable clay has the workability to shape, mold and hold hair in place while providing the ability to create and rework styles throughout the day. Powered by our Our Thickening Molecule (PBAE) and blend of temperature sensitive resins, Molding Clay: 

  • shapes your hair into dynamic styles on damp or dry hair
  • keeps your style in place
  • remains malleable & revivable so you can change your style throughout the day 
  • has medium hold and matte finish

Molding Clay is ideal for men and women with short hair. It is silicone-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

Which hair type is it good for?

  • Straight
  • Wavy

  • Coiled

What it is:

A travel kit that cleanses, conditions, styles, and extends, allowing you to enjoy your beautiful, healthy-looking hair for days. 

Key benefits: 

  • Improves hair health over time 
  • Lets you wash less often
  • Extends styles for days 

If you want to know more…

Wherever you’re going this holiday season, take our award-winning, bestselling Perfect hair Day™ franchise with you for healthy and happy hair days. Powered by the patented healthy hair molecule (OFPMA), these products leave hair soft and clean.  

PhD Shampoo and Conditioner are the first and second steps to helping you wash your hair less often and making hair look healthier. 5-in-1 Styling Treatment delivers the five benefits for beautiful healthy-looking hair in one easy step: smoothness, volume, conditioning, strength, and polish. Dry Shampoo absorbs and removes oil, sweat, and odor, and delivers a time-released fragrance for a light, clean scent throughout the day. It works on all hair colors because it leaves virtually no visible residue or powdery build-up behind. 

This set contains:

  • 2 oz PhD Shampoo 
  • 2 oz PhD Conditioner 
  • 2 oz PhD 5-in-1 Styling Treatment

product.short-description:
Restore Smooth Blowout Concentrate is a time-saving, transformative styling treatment that gives coarse or thick hair types a smooth, easy and visibly healthier blowout – in half the time.

Restore Smooth Blowout Concentrate contains a heat-activated formula with reparative ingredients that smooth the cuticle, help hair dry faster (without excessive heat or mechanical damage), and protect against future styling damage.

Restore Smooth Blowout Concentrate is designed to address the 3 pain points for creating a smooth blowout on coarse or thick hair:

  • Smoothness: Our patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA) and reparative ingredients make hair look and feel softer, shinier and more manageable.
  • Speed: Our Speed Dry formula cuts blowout time in half – with less heat and mechanical stress.
    • Two-thirds of women agreed cuts blowout time in half.
  • Protection: Thermal protectants shield hair from heat up to 450° F/230° C and prevent future thermal damage.

Restore Smooth Blowout Concentrate is ideal for coarse or thick hair. Safe for color-treated hair.
